# ğŸŒ¾ Nepal Crop Price & Climate Analysis App

This Streamlit web app analyzes the impact of climate variables on **rice** and **wheat flour** prices across different districts in Nepal. It includes data visualization, statistical insights, and machine learning-based price prediction models.

---

## ğŸ“Š Features

- ğŸ“ˆ Visualize rice and wheat flour prices over time.
- ğŸ—ºï¸ Static map of Nepal showing average crop prices by district.
- ğŸ”¥ Correlation heatmap between climate and crop price data.
- ğŸ¤– ML model (Random Forest) to predict rice prices using top climate and spatial features.
- ğŸ“Œ Feature importance visualization for price prediction.
